languages.text: {n}Старуха выхватывает следующий пергамент.{/n} "Славно, что вы подали голос, Грегорас. Дополнением к судебному разбирательству рассматриваются ереси Соломона Антара, причиной коих стала моральная слабость в противостоянии стяжательству ерети{mf|ка|чки} фон Валанциус".

{n}The old woman snatches up the next parchment.{/n} "How good of you to speak up, Gregoras. As an addendum to the proceedings, we will be examining the heresies of Solomorne Anthar resulting from his moral failure to oppose the greed of the heretic von Valancius."
languages.original_text: {n}Старуха выхватывает следующий пергамент.{/n} "Славно, что вы подали голос, Грегорас. Дополнением к судебному разбирательству рассматриваются ереси Соломона Антара, причиной коих стала моральная слабость в противостоянии стяжательству ерети{mf|ка|чки} фон Валанциус".

traits.locale_text: {n}The old woman snatches up the next parchment.{/n} "How good of you to finally speak up, Gregoras. As an addendum to the proceedings, we will be examining the heresies of Solomorne Anthar resulting from his moral failure to oppose the greed of the heretic von Valancius."

{n}The old woman snatches up the next parchment.{/n} "How good of you to finally speak up, Gregoras. As an addendum to the proceedings, we will be examining the heresies of Solomorne Anthar resulting from his moral failure to oppose the greed of the heretic von Valancius."

{n}The old woman snatches up the next parchment.{/n} "How good of you to finally speak up, Gregoras. As an addendum to the proceedings, we will be examining the heresies of Solomorne Anthar resulting from his moral failure to oppose the greed of the heretic von Valancius."

{n}The old woman snatches up the next parchment.{/n} "How good of you to speak up, Gregoras. As an addendum to the proceedings, we will be examining the heresies of Solomorne Anthar resulting from his moral failure to oppose the greed of the heretic von Valancius."

{n}The old woman snatches up the next parchment.{/n} "How good of you to speak up, Gregoras. As an addendum to the proceedings, we will be examining the heresies of Solomorne Anthar resulting from his moral failure to oppose the greed of the heretic von Valancius."

languages.text: {n}Die alte Frau öffnet das nächste Pergament.{/n} "Wie schön, dass Ihr Euch zu Wort meldet, Gregoras. Wir werden im Rahmen des Verfahrens die Ketzereien von Solomorne Anthar prüfen, die aus seinem moralisches Versagen hinsichtlich der Gier {mf|des Ketzers|der Ketzerin} von Valancius resultierten."
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman snatches up the next parchment.{/n} "How good of you to speak up, Gregoras. As an addendum to the proceedings, we will be examining the heresies of Solomorne Anthar resulting from his moral failure to oppose the greed of the heretic von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die alte Frau öffnet das nächste Pergament.{/n} "Wie schön, dass Ihr Euch zu Wort meldet, Gregoras. Wir werden im Rahmen des Verfahrens die Ketzereien von Solomorne Anthar prüfen, die aus seinem moralisches Versagen hinsichtlich der Gier {mf|des Ketzers|der Ketzerin} von Valancius resultierten."

languages.text: {n}La vieille femme s'empare du parchemin suivant.{/n} « Je suis fort aise de vous entendre prendre la parole, Gregoras. En complément à la présente procédure, nous examinerons les hérésies de Solomorne Anthar résultant de son incapacité morale à s'opposer à la cupidité de l'hérétique von Valancius. »
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman snatches up the next parchment.{/n} "How good of you to speak up, Gregoras. As an addendum to the proceedings, we will be examining the heresies of Solomorne Anthar resulting from his moral failure to oppose the greed of the heretic von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: {n}La vieille femme s'empare du parchemin suivant.{/n} « Je suis fort aise de vous entendre prendre la parole, Gregoras. En complément à la présente procédure, nous examinerons les hérésies de Solomorne Anthar résultant de son incapacité morale à s'opposer à la cupidité de l'hérétique von Valancius. »

languages.text: {n}老妇人抓起另一份卷宗。{/n}“你终于开口了，格雷戈拉斯。接下来，作为这场审判的补充，我们准备着重探讨索罗蒙·安萨的异端邪说。面对冯·瓦兰修斯家族的异端分子，他屈从于贪婪的诱惑，未能保持应有的道德标准。”
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman snatches up the next parchment.{/n} "How good of you to speak up, Gregoras. As an addendum to the proceedings, we will be examining the heresies of Solomorne Anthar resulting from his moral failure to oppose the greed of the heretic von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: {n}老妇人抓起另一份卷宗。{/n}“你终于开口了，格雷戈拉斯。接下来，作为这场审判的补充，我们准备着重探讨索罗蒙·安萨的异端邪说。面对冯·瓦兰修斯家族的异端分子，他屈从于贪婪的诱惑，未能保持应有的道德标准。”

languages.text: {n}La anciana coge el siguiente pergamino.{/n} «Me alegro de que te hayas pronunciado, Gregoras. Como añadido a este proceso, examinaremos las herejías de Solomorne Anthar a causa de su fracaso moral para oponerse a la codicia de{mf|l| la} hereje von Valancius».
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman snatches up the next parchment.{/n} "How good of you to speak up, Gregoras. As an addendum to the proceedings, we will be examining the heresies of Solomorne Anthar resulting from his moral failure to oppose the greed of the heretic von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: {n}La anciana coge el siguiente pergamino.{/n} «Me alegro de que te hayas pronunciado, Gregoras. Como añadido a este proceso, examinaremos las herejías de Solomorne Anthar a causa de su fracaso moral para oponerse a la codicia de{mf|l| la} hereje von Valancius».

languages.text: {n}老女は素早く次の書面を手に取った。{/n}「グレゴラス、発言してくれて助かりました。審理への追補として、ソロモーン・アンサールが異端者フォン・ヴァランシウスの貪欲に抗うことを道徳的に怠った結果として生じた異端行為についても審査を行います」
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman snatches up the next parchment.{/n} "How good of you to speak up, Gregoras. As an addendum to the proceedings, we will be examining the heresies of Solomorne Anthar resulting from his moral failure to oppose the greed of the heretic von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: {n}老女は素早く次の書面を手に取った。{/n}「グレゴラス、発言してくれて助かりました。審理への追補として、ソロモーン・アンサールが異端者フォン・ヴァランシウスの貪欲に抗うことを道徳的に怠った結果として生じた異端行為についても審査を行います」

languages.text: {n}Yaşlı kadın, sıradaki parşömeni eline alıyor.{/n} "Ne güzel söyledin Gregoras. Duruşmaya ilaveten, kâfir von Valancius'un kötü emellerine ahlaken karşı gelme vazifesini yerine getirmekten âciz kalmış Solomorne Anthar'ın küfürlerini de masaya yatıracağız."
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman snatches up the next parchment.{/n} "How good of you to speak up, Gregoras. As an addendum to the proceedings, we will be examining the heresies of Solomorne Anthar resulting from his moral failure to oppose the greed of the heretic von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yaşlı kadın, sıradaki parşömeni eline alıyor.{/n} "Ne güzel söyledin Gregoras. Duruşmaya ilaveten, kâfir von Valancius'un kötü emellerine ahlaken karşı gelme vazifesini yerine getirmekten aciz kalmış Solomorne Anthar'ın küfürlerini de masaya yatıracağız."
